title: ‘Offense is the Best Defense’: Pidcock Shatters Power Record and Closes in on First GC Victory in Dream Debut
content:
'I set a new 5–10-minute power record:' Pidcock wins for second time this week to silence critics in high-pressure debut with Q36.5.

Read the full article at ‘Offense is the Best Defense’: Pidcock Shatters Power Record and Closes in on First GC Victory in Dream Debut on Velo.
author: ahood
